text: Can someone please take a look at this github workflow and let me know if there's any reason why it wouldn't work with the boilerplate github actions setup? <https://gist.github.com/forest/19fc774dde34f77e2540>
I want to create a feature branch, test it on my dev site, and then merge it via a pull request—will that trigger github actions to update production?
It would be weird if nobody else is experiencing this issue—so I assume the problem is on my end. But it's happening on two different computers—the latest setup just recently.
Thank you for creating an issue <@UDHT6N5SM> I’ll make sure our engineers see it.
The feeling of finally understanding how git/github works should be bottled :champagne:
